external_games.name: Idle Champions - Masquerade Ball Ellywick Theme Pack

name: Idle Champions: Masquerade Ball Ellywick Theme Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Ellywick (if you don't already have them) Masquerade Ball Ellywick Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Ellywick 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Ellywick Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards
